post.author: nestel34
post.body:
ok the problem is the game, the level crash that I try to load him in Prey ... I do the stuff like wiki tut, I put a Volume_gravity entity and switcher I conect tham and is not work to me, the bast help is to sand me exmpole map with this thet i can leren more esey

Thank's for the helpers...

David

post.author: NX-317
post.body:
I'm glad to see that you decided to map for Prey. There are very few maps available so it would be very good to have another map.

Quote:
level crash that I try to load him in Prey ...

Maps often crash if you try to launch them without closing the editor. Try closing the editor, then launching the game and loading the map. If it still crashes, then there is a problem with the map itself or your installation of Prey.

Here's the example map with gravity volumes.

post.author: nestel34
post.body: Thank now I make a new great map, wait for suppries...
